mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.zhuyuanxinxi_id AS "zhuyuanxinxiId", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.chuyuanshijian AS "chuyuanshijian", a.chuyaunzhenduan AS "chuyaunzhenduan", a.zhenliaojieguo AS "zhenliaojieguo", a.chuyuanqingkuang AS "chuyuanqingkuang", a.chuyuanyizhu AS "chuyuanyizhu", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ruyuanbingqing AS "ruyuanbingqing"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO electron_leave_hospital( id, zhuyuanxinxi_id, patient_id, chuyuanshijian, chuyaunzhenduan, zhenliaojieguo, chuyuanqingkuang, chuyuanyizhu, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, ruyuanbingqing ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{zhuyuanxinxiId}, #{patientId}, #{chuyuanshijian}, #{chuyaunzhenduan}, #{zhenliaojieguo}, #{chuyuanqingkuang}, #{chuyuanyizhu}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{ruyuanbingqing} )
mapper.update: UPDATE electron_leave_hospital SET zhuyuanxinxi_id = #{zhuyuanxinxiId}, patient_id = #{patientId}, chuyuanshijian = #{chuyuanshijian}, chuyaunzhenduan = #{chuyaunzhenduan}, zhenliaojieguo = #{zhenliaojieguo}, chuyuanqingkuang = #{chuyuanqingkuang}, chuyuanyizhu = #{chuyuanyizhu}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, ruyuanbingqing = #{ruyuanbingqing} WHERE id = #{id}
